briefTitle: Use of Perioperative Pain Blocks In Urological Surgery

armGroups.label: Ultrasound-guided transversus abdominus plane (UTAP) block
interventionNames: Drug: Ultrasound-guided transversus abdominus plane block

armGroups.label: Laparoscopic-guided transversus abdominus plane (LTAP) block
interventionNames: Drug: Laparoscopic-guided transversus abdominus plane block

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Age 18 years or older
* Undergoing Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Partial Nephrectomy or Robotic Assisted Laparoscopic Prostatectomy
* Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior Partial Nephrectomy or Subtotal Prostatectomy Surgery (organ specific)
* Conversion to open surgery
* History of chronic pain
* History of opiate or alcohol dependence
* Allergies to local anesthetic
* Retroperitoneal surgery
* Single Port Surgery

outcomeMeasures.title: Visual Analog Scale (VAS)
outcomeMeasures.description: Visual analog scale (VAS) is a pain rating scale, with full scale from 0 to 10, higher score indicating more pain

outcomeMeasures.title: Intraoperative Time and Block Time
outcomeMeasures.description: Intraoperative time taken to complete surgical blocks and operative

outcomeMeasures.title: Intraoperative Narcotic Use
outcomeMeasures.description: Intraoperative Narcotic Use in morphine equivalents

outcomeMeasures.title: Postoperative Narcotic Use
outcomeMeasures.description: Postoperative Narcotic Use in morphine equivalents

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Analgesic Medications
outcomeMeasures.description: The 24-hour cumulative postoperative opioid analgesic requirement was calculated using standard tables to morphine equivalents.

outcomeMeasures.title: The Amount of Ondansetron Use
outcomeMeasures.description: Use of antiemetic medications during the postoperative course

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Days to Return of Bowel Function
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of days to the return of bowel function

outcomeMeasures.title: The Length of Hospital Stay
outcomeMeasures.description: Length of hospital stay from time of surgical completion to time of discharge.

outcomeMeasures.title: VAS in Obese Patients
outcomeMeasures.description: 24 hour postoperative pain scores recorded using the visual analog scale (VAS) in obese patients. Visual analog scale (VAS) is a pain rating scale, with full scale from 0 to 10, higher score indicating more pain. Comparison in patients with BMI \>30 and BMI\<30

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Procedure Related Complications
outcomeMeasures.description: Procedure related complications and adverse events including bleeding or injection of anesthetic intravascular was determined according to Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events (CTCAE v 4.0).
